title: How to Make Champagne Cake

steps.headline: Prepare cake using package directions using 1 1/3 cups champagne instead of the water.
Cook cake layers on wire baking racks.
Add the pudding mix to a bowl.
Add 1 cup heavy cream to pudding mix.
Beat pudding mixture until it begins to thicken.
Add 1/4 cup champagne slowly to the pudding mixture.
Allow the pudding mixture to stand a few minutes to thicken.
Spread filling between the two cake layers.
Tint whipped cream with red food coloring until the desired shade of pink is reached.
Frost the cake with the pink tinted whipped cream.
Store the cake in the refrigerator due to the whipped cream in the filling and frosting.

text: Cake Prepare cake using package directions using 1 1/3 cups champagne instead of the water.  Bake as directed.  Cook cake layers on wire baking racks.  Filling Add the pudding mix to a bowl.  Add 1 cup heavy cream to pudding mix.  Beat pudding mixture until it begins to thicken.  Add 1/4 cup champagne slowly to the pudding mixture.  Allow the pudding mixture to stand a few minutes to thicken.  Spread filling between the two cake layers.  Frosting Whip 1 cup heavy cream.  Tint whipped cream with red food coloring until the desired shade of pink is reached.  Frost the cake with the pink tinted whipped cream.  Store the cake in the refrigerator due to the whipped cream in the filling and frosting.  Finished.
